nodes.text: The Gray Fox was a model of truncated speeder bike produced by the Meirm Speeder Emporium during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.

The Meirm Gray Fox was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 3.2: Rise of the Emperor, in which it is purchasable from the Security Key Vendor by players who have a security key.
